meanings.sent1: She remained undiscouraged despite facing many challenges.
meanings.sent2: The undiscouraged student kept trying until he succeeded.
meanings.sent3: Even after failing the first time, he was undiscouraged and tried again.
meanings.sent4: Her undiscouraged spirit shone brightly in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The undiscouraged athlete's determination was truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: His undiscouraged attitude motivated others to keep going.
meanings.sent2: The team's undiscouraged efforts paid off in the end.
meanings.sent3: With undiscouraged resolve, he tackled the difficult task.
meanings.sent4: The undiscouraged explorer ventured into the unknown with bravery.
meanings.sent5: Their undiscouraged commitment to the project was commendable.

meanings.sent1: Despite the setbacks, she remained undiscouraged about the future.
meanings.sent2: The undiscouraged outlook of the community lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent3: Even on rainy days, he was undiscouraged and smiled brightly.
meanings.sent4: Her undiscouraged belief in better days ahead kept her going.
meanings.sent5: The undiscouraged nature of the garden brought joy to all who visited.
